name: Social Distancing: The Game
description:
Make your way home while maintaining your distance from other people.

This game was developed using Bitsy and serves to promote the "Stay at home. Save Lives" campaign during the COVID-19 pandemic. It is a short puzzle game that might prove to be a tricky challenge that takes a few minutes of your time to complete.

Click here to find out ways you can help with the effort to tackle the COVID-19 pandemic.
